items.longDescription:

- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.

items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long cotton fibers for a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- A casually refined style.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette to accentuate the draping fabric.
- In a well-balanced cut that is slim but still easy to move in
- This item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar and used a firm neck for the base collar with a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By reducing the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful print pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The armholes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded down so that it does not touch your skin.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt

- By focusing on the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.

- This item can be used for any occasion and is great for day-to-day coordination.

- We’ve adjusted the angles of the back pockets and positioned the front pockets slightly higher.

- The side seams are made of soft thread and feel great against the skin.

items.longDescription:
- Made with comfort stretch denim that's both flexible and authentic.
- This season's updated design was to revise all the patterns including the knee position and creating a refined, slim, long, straight look.
- A little extra depth was added to the hips to increase comfort.
- The front pockets are slightly higher and the back pocket angles have been adjusted to accentuate your legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- A careful repair process highlights a level of distressed style like never before.
- The buttons and rivet colors are made with natural, worn-in plating, so you'll love the details.

- Micro fleece lining for chest pockets to even out the different thicknesses of boa and woven fabric.

- Binding cuff design prevents cold air coming in and lets sleeves be rolled up to the arms.

items.name: MEN Hybrid Down Coat
items.shortDescription: A sleek coat that combines premium down and high-tech padding for exceptional heat retention.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Sleeve: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Lining: 100% Polyamide/ Rib: 96% Polyester, 4% Elastane
items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Moisture-absorbent bio-warming padding used in the sleeves.
- Resin-coated shell interior.
- Made from slightly glossy nylon fabric.
- Contoured design.
- Oversized cut. Grosgrain tape adds a functional design accent to the pockets.
- +J embossed logo tape at the back collar.
items.name: MEN Hybrid Down Oversized MA-1 Jacket
items.shortDescription: A blouson version of our hybrid down. A modern oversized cut. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Made from extra-long pile 100% combed cashmere.
- The hem and cuffs feature a substantial Milano rib-knit finish.
- Sophisticated colour details inside the collar.
items.name: MEN Cashmere Turtle Neck Long Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: A luxurious 100% fine gauge cashmere turtle neck. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.composition: Shell: 60% Polyester, 40% Elastomultiester/ Filling: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyamide
items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Controlled oversized A-line cut with rounded sleeves.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Matte Nylon fabric.
- Double hip pockets.
items.name: MEN Padded Oversized Single Breasted Coat
items.shortDescription: A versatile single breasted coat with a sophisticated matte finish. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.composition: Shell: 78% Wool, 22% Polyamide/ Filling: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyamide
items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Original Melton wool blend fabric.
- Contoured form showcases the thick fabric.
- Bold details add a design accent.
- Oversized cut.
items.name: MEN Wool Blended Oversized Pea Coat
items.shortDescription: A classic pea coat that combines substance and style. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Melton wool blend. Contoured regular-fit cut.
items.name: MEN Wool Blended Chesterfield Coat
items.shortDescription: An essential coat with a substantial feel and a flattering cut. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.
